page.title: 14A HOUSE IN SINFIN
page.content: The age of my house is about 50 years old,it has 5 rooms. Two of them are bedrooms. My front garden is small, only about 4 metres long.My back garden is about 12 metres long. My house is a brick built terraced house there are other houses attached but they are smaller. It is dark brown but half way up it stops to get a light brown where it has been painted.It has slates on the top but one of them is missing but no rain gets in so we are all right. The council own the house but soon my parents will own it so we can paint it a different colour my dad will paint it white and we could sell it. If he sells it we might move to Chaddesden where my Grandma and Auntie live. By Carl.
